Name: 2022生存指南 2022 SURVIVAL GUIDE
About the game: 2022 Survival Guide is a survival action puzzle video game produced by Dark Studio. The background of the game is in a modern Chinese mall where a zombie virus suddenly outbreak. Survivors led by Xv Haiyang have to try their best to survive in the shopping mall. There are many different zombie bosses in the shopping mall, and players can choose to fight to kill the boss (difficult way) or find the weakness of the boss through the puzzle solving, Without injury. The game is not an open world game or a pure action game, but a plot game that has a complete story to guide the player pass the game. 1.New single game mode. 2.More than 30 kinds of weapons and items can interact with players, more than 10 melee weapons -ax, chainsaw, pan, baseball stick -let players and zombies contact intimately. Newborn returned. New story. New dialogue. 3.The unique secret system, when the BOSS is too strong to overcome, can try to defeat the BOSS through puzzle solving puzzles. 4.'Unusual' ordinary infection. Each level has at least one 'unusual' general infection exclusive to the campaign. 5.Note: This game for personal development, limited technology, if U have the high requirements for game graphics, character action,you must be careful to buy it.
Developers: 塔克设计工作室DARK STUDIO,毛玮欣MAO WEIXIN
Publishers: 塔克设计工作室DARK STUDIO,毛玮欣MAO WEIXIN
